  1 <?php
  2 
  3 namespace UserFrosting;
  4 
  5 use \Illuminate\Database\Capsule\Manager as Capsule;
  6 
  7 /**
  8  * ApiController Class
  9  *
 10  * Controller class for /api/* URLs.  Handles all api requests.
 11  *
 12  * @package UserFrosting
 13  * @author Alex Weissman
 14  * @link http://www.userfrosting.com/navigating/#structure
 15  */
 16 class ApiController extends \UserFrosting\BaseController {
 17 
 18     /**
 19      * Create a new ApiController object.
 20      *
 21      * @param UserFrosting $app The main UserFrosting app.
 22      */
 23     public function __construct($app){
 24         $this->_app = $app;
 25     }
 26     
 27     /**
 28      * Returns a list of Users
 29      *
 30      * Generates a list of users, optionally paginated, sorted and/or filtered.
 31      * This page requires authentication.
 32      * Request type: GET
 33      * @param int $page optional.  For paging, the page number to start with.
 34      * @param int $size optional.  For paging, the number of results per page.
 35      * @param string $primary_group_name optional.  If specified, will only display users in that particular primary group.
 36      */        
 37     public function listUsers($page = 0, $size = 10, $primary_group_name = null){
 38         $get = $this->_app->request->get();
 39                 
 40         $size = isset($get['size']) ? $get['size'] : 10;
 41         $page = isset($get['page']) ? $get['page'] : 0;
 42         $sort_field = isset($get['sort_field']) ? $get['sort_field'] : "user_name";
 43         $sort_order = isset($get['sort_order']) ? $get['sort_order'] : "asc";
 44         $filters = isset($get['filters']) ? $get['filters'] : [];
 45         $primary_group_name = isset($get['primary_group']) ? $get['primary_group'] : null;
 46         
 47         $offset = $size*$page;                
 48                 
 49         // Optional filtering by primary group
 50         if ($primary_group_name){
 51             $primary_group = Group::where('name', $primary_group_name)->first();
 52             
 53             if (!$primary_group)
 54                 $this->_app->notFound();
 55             
 56             // Access-controlled page
 57             if (!$this->_app->user->checkAccess('uri_group_users', ['primary_group_id' => $primary_group->id])){
 58                 $this->_app->notFound();
 59             }
 60             
 61             $userQuery = new User;
 62             $userQuery = $userQuery->where('primary_group_id', $primary_group->id);
 63             
 64         } else {
 65             // Access-controlled page
 66             if (!$this->_app->user->checkAccess('uri_users')){
 67                 $this->_app->notFound();
 68             }
 69             
 70             $userQuery = new User;
 71         }
 72                 
 73         // Count unpaginated total
 74         $total = $userQuery->count();
 75             
 76         // Exclude fields
 77         $userQuery = $userQuery
 78                 ->exclude(['password', 'secret_token']);
 79         
 80         //Capsule::connection()->enableQueryLog();
 81         
 82         // Get unfiltered, unsorted, unpaginated collection
 83         $user_collection = $userQuery->get();
 84         
 85         // Load recent events for all users and merge into the collection.  This can't be done in one query,
 86         // at least not efficiently.  See http://laravel.io/forum/04-05-2014-eloquent-eager-loading-to-limit-for-each-post
 87         $last_sign_in_times = $user_collection->getRecentEvents('sign_in');
 88         $last_sign_up_times = $user_collection->getRecentEvents('sign_up', 'sign_up_time');
 89         
 90         // Apply filters        
 91         foreach ($filters as $name => $value){
 92             // For date filters, search for weekday, month, or year
 93             if ($name == 'last_sign_in_time') {
 94                 $user_collection = $user_collection->filterRecentEventTime('sign_in', $last_sign_in_times, $value);
 95             } else if ($name == 'sign_up_time') {
 96                 $user_collection = $user_collection->filterRecentEventTime('sign_up', $last_sign_up_times, $value, "Unknown");
 97             } else {
 98                 $user_collection = $user_collection->filterTextField($name, $value);
 99             }
100         }
101         
102         // Count filtered results
103         $total_filtered = count($user_collection);
104         
105         // Paginate and sort
106         if ($sort_order == "desc")
107             $user_collection = $user_collection->sortByDesc($sort_field);
108         else        
109             $user_collection = $user_collection->sortBy($sort_field);
110                     
111         $user_collection = $user_collection->slice($offset, $size);     
112                 
113         $result = [
114             "count" => $total,
115             "rows" => $user_collection->values()->toArray(),
116             "count_filtered" => $total_filtered
117         ];
118         
119         //$query = Capsule::getQueryLog();    
120         
121         // Be careful how you consume this data - it has not been escaped and contains untrusted user-supplied content.
122         // For example, if you plan to insert it into an HTML DOM, you must escape it on the client side (or use client-side templating).
123         $this->_app->response->headers->set('Content-Type', 'application/json; charset=utf-8');
124         echo json_encode($result, JSON_PRETTY_PRINT);
125     }
126 }
